ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: which calls for all who drew back and turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It will summon whoever turns his back and flees,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It shall insistently summon him who turned his back and retreated,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and drag into it anyone who has turned away (from obeying God),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It calls out to him who reverted and turned away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Calling (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: It shall claim him who turned and fled (from truth),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: calling him who drew back and turned away,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It calleth him who turned and fled (from truth),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and it will claim all those who turned their backs [on the true faith] and turned away [from the truth],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It shall calll him who turneth back and backslideth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: It invites him, who has turned back [from the truth] and forsaken [it],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Inviting (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from the Right).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Calling: "[O Kafir (O disbeliever in Allah, His angels, His Book, His Messengers, Day of Resurrection and in Al-Qadar (Divine Preordainments), O Mushrik (O polytheist, disbeliever in the Oneness of Allah)] (all) such as turn their backs and turn away their faces (from Faith) [picking and swallowing them up from that great gathering of mankind (on the Day of Resurrection) just as a bird picks up a food-grain from the earth with its beak and swallows it up] [Tafsir Al-Qurtubi, Vol. 18, Page 289]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and it shall call him who withdrew and turned his back
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It invites him who once turned his back and fled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: It invites he who turned his back [on truth] and went away [from obedience]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:17] it will call him who turned his back and ignored, faith, saying [to him]: ‘To me ! to me [come hither]!’,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 693 (It calleth) to itself: "come to me, disbeliever!", "come to me, hypocrite" (him who turned) from Allah's divine Oneness (and fled) from faith and did not repent of disbelief,
